Description_lang: Every $t1 sec, the Heart of Azeroth empowers you with $295756s2 Haste, Mastery, or Critical Strike. After reaching $s1 stacks of either Haste, Mastery, or Critical Strike, the Heart of Azeroth temporarily overcharges, doubling the effects of Engine of Ceaseless Progress for $295783d, after which the stacks are removed. When you gain a stack of one of the Engine buffs, you have a $295785s1% chance to generate an additional stack, and a $295787s1% chance to gain all three Engine effects instead of a random one.
